description:
Under the leadership of Ygraine, King Ishurna`s daughter, the people have turned into a mob. Tachibana has joined the rebel army after being swept up in everything by Ygraine, Meanwhile, the shadow of the Demon King`s army sneaks in, unnoticed. At the same time, Schwartz and Lucius, who have been called in by the king to gain control over the rebel army, head out to intercept the mob closing in on the royal capital, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Guy Who Reincarnated as a Fantasy Knockout and a Rebel Army
Fa Bi Niku Ojisan to Hanran
La belle, le trentenaire et la rébellion
ファ美肉おじさんと反乱
